purpleculture_pinyin:
cáng
to conceal; to hide away; to harbor; to store; to collect
скрыть; спрятаться; укрывать; хранить; собирать

zàng
Tibet; Xizang 西藏 ; storehouse; depository; Buddhist or Taoist scripture
Тибет; Xizang 西藏; склад; депозитарий; Буддийские или даосские писания
rtega_mnemonic:
藏藏RS
蔵蔵		𫟖hide, conceal, hoard, store up
  • subject 臧 hidden under grass 艹
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 臧 indicates the sound; 艹 (grass) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
收藏 [ shōu cáng ]: to hoard; to collect; collection; to bookmark (Internet)
隐藏 [ yǐn cáng ]: to hide; to conceal; to mask; to shelter; to harbor (i.e. keep sth hidden); to hide oneself; to lie low; to nestle; hidden; implicit; private; covert; recessed (lighting)
蕴藏 [ yùn cáng ]: to hold in store; to contain (untapped reserves etc)
珍藏 [ zhēn cáng ]: collection; to collect (valuables)
藏书 [ cáng shū ]: to collect books; library collection
藏族 [ zàng zú ]: Tibetan ethnic group
宝藏 [ bǎo zàng ]: precious mineral deposits; hidden treasure; (fig.) treasure; (Buddhism) the treasure of Buddha's law
藏青 [ zàng qīng ]: see 藏青色
道藏 [ dào zàng ]: Daoist scripture
藏语 [ zàng yǔ ]: Tibetan language
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 艹 [ cǎo ] grass, weed, plant, herb
    • 臧 [ zāng ] good, right; generous; to command
heisig_chinese_memo: The underling isn't allowed to join the parade but he goes anyway and tries to hide under the flowers on the top bunk of the bunk bed float.
Ru_trainchinese:
cáng: (глаг) собирать, хранить; прятать
zàng: (сущ) (сокр.) Тибет
zàng: (графема) хранилище, склад; буддийский или даосский канон
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The underling isn't allowed to join the parade but he goes anyway and tries to hide under the flowers on the top bunk of the bunk bed float.
humanum_full_description_en:
"Said Wen. New Attachment: "Hide, hide. Yesterday Lang cut." Xu Xuan's note: "The "Hanshu" is commonly used for Zang characters. From Zong, later generations added." Xu's statement is reasonable. Check the Shuihudi and Mawangdui bamboo slips and silk materials, including more than 60 " Zang " characters Basically all written as " Zang ". See " Zang ". "Zuo Zhuan‧ Eighteen Years of Wengong": "Hiding the thief to hide"

In addition, " zang " can also mean " burial. " Since both have the meaning of burying, they have the relationship of the same word.
humanum_full_description:
《說文．新附》：「藏，匿也。昨郎切」。 徐鉉注：「《漢書》通用臧字。从艸，後人所加。」徐氏所言有理，查睡虎地及馬王堆所出簡帛資料，其中六十多個「藏」字基本上全部寫作「臧」。參見「臧」。《左傳‧ 文公十八年》：「掩賊為藏」。

　　此外，「藏」又可通「葬」，由於二者皆有掩埋之意，故有同源字之關係。

HSK: 5
Freq: 907
Chinese: The underling isn't allowed to join the parade but he goes anyway and tries to hide under the flowers on the top bunk of the bunk bed float.
Meaning: hide
Story: The underling isn't allowed to join the parade but he goes anyway and tries to hide under the flowers on the top bunk of the bunk bed float.
Kind: both

《說文．新附》：「藏，匿也。昨郎切」。 徐鉉注：「《漢書》通用臧字。从艸，後人所加。」徐氏所言有理，查睡虎地及馬王堆所出簡帛資料，其中六十多個「 藏 」字基本上全部寫作「 臧 」。參見「 臧 」。《左傳‧ 文公十八年》：「掩賊為藏」。 此外，「 藏 」又可通「 葬 」，由於二者皆有掩埋之意，故有同源字之關係。
"Said Wen. New Attachment: "Hide, hide. Yesterday Lang cut." Xu Xuan's note: "The "Hanshu" is commonly used for Zang characters. From Zong, later generations added." Xu's statement is reasonable. Check the Shuihudi and Mawangdui bamboo slips and silk materials, including more than 60 " Zang" characters Basically all written as " Zang". See " Zang". "Zuo Zhuan‧ Eighteen Years of Wengong": "Hiding the thief to hide" In addition, " zang" can also mean " burial." Since both have the meaning of burying, they have the relationship of the same word.

藏字的基本解释

藏
cáng
隐避起来：埋藏。包藏。藏奸。藏匿。隐藏。蕴藏。藏污纳垢。
收存起来：收藏。藏品。藏书。储藏。
躲匿露

藏
zàng
储放东西的地方：藏府。宝藏。
道教、佛教经典的总称：道藏。大藏经。三藏（佛教经典“经”、“律”、“论”三部分）。
中国少数民族，主要分布于西藏自治区和青海、四川等省：藏族。
中国西藏自治区的简称。
古同“臟”。
躲匿露

藏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cáng］
［《廣韻》昨郎切，平唐，從。］
“匨2”的今字。亦作“1”。亦作“蔵1”。“臧2”的今字。
(1)隐藏；潜匿。
(2)收藏；储藏。
(3)怀，藏在心中。
(4)深，从上到下或从外到里的距离大。
[②]［zàng］
［《廣韻》徂浪切，去宕，從。］
(1)储存东西的地方。
(2)宝藏。
(3)内脏。后作“臟”。
(4)埋葬。
(5)墓穴；坟墓。
(6)佛教经典的总称。后也称道教经典。
(7)我国少数民族名。详“藏2族”。
(8)西藏自治区的简称。
[③]［zāng］
［《集韻》兹郎切，平唐，精。］
(1)草名。
(2)通“臧”。善。
(3)通“贜”。窝主。

藏字的英文翻译

◎ 藏
conceal, hide, store

藏字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　藏； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1064第22
〔古文〕匨【唐韻】昨郞切【正韻】徂郞切，?音鑶。【說文】匿也。【易·乾·文言】潛龍勿用，陽氣潛藏。　又蓄也。【易·繫辭】君子藏器于身，待時而動。　又兹郞切，音臧。草名。【司馬相如·子虛賦】其埤濕，則生藏莨、蒹葭。【註】藏莨，草中牛馬芻。　又才浪切，音臓。【禮·月令】謹蓋藏。【晉語】文公之出也，豎頭須，守藏者也，不從。　又與臓通。【周禮·天官·疾醫】參之以九藏之動。【註】正藏五，又有胃、膀胱、大腸、小腸。【疏】正藏五者，謂心、肝、脾、肺、腎，?氣之所藏。【白虎通】人有五藏六府，何法，法五行六合也。　【說文】《漢書》通用臧。

考證：〔【晉語】文公之出也，豎豆須守藏者也。〕　謹照原文豆改頭。〔【周禮·天官·醫師】參之以九藏之動。〕　謹照原書醫師改疾醫。
藏字的源字形

藏字的起名意思

：本义是把谷物保藏起来。也有隐蔽、收藏起来的意思。

Tibetan
cáng
Hide away: buried. Concealed. Hidden traitor. hide. hide. Concealed. Hidden dirt.
Put away: Collect. Collection. Collection of books. Storage.
Hide
Tibetan

Place to store things: Tibetan house. Treasure.
The general name of Taoism and Buddhist scriptures: Taoism. Tripitaka. Sanzang (three parts of Buddhist classics: "Sutra", "Law" and "On").
Chinese ethnic minorities are mainly distributed in the Tibet Autonomous Region and Qinghai, Sichuan and other provinces: Tibetans.

Tibetan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cáng］
["Guangyun" Lang cut yesterday, Ping Tang, from. ]
The present word for "匨2". Also known as "1". Also known as "蔵1". The present word for "Zang 2".
(1) Hiding; hiding.
(2) Collection; storage.
(3) Embrace, hide in the heart.
(4) Deep, the distance from top to bottom or from outside to inside is large.
[②]［zàng］
["Guangyun" cut waves, go to dang, from. ]
(1) A place to store things.
(2) Treasures.
(3) Internal organs. Later referred to as "dirty".
(4) Burial.
(5) Tomb; tomb.
(6) The general term for Buddhist scriptures. Later it was also called Taoist classics.
(7) The names of ethnic minorities in our country. Details "Tibet 2".
(8) The abbreviation of Tibet Autonomous Region.
[③]［zāng］
["Ji Yun" Zi Lang Qi, Ping Tang, Jing. ]
(1) Cursive name.
(2) Through "Zang". good.
(3) Through "贜". Nest owner.

conceal, hide, store
Tibetan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Jian Characters] 　 Zang; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1064 Page 22
[Ancient text] 匨【Tang Yun】Yesterday Tan cut [Zheng Yun] 徂郞切,? Sound. 【Said the text】Hidden also. 【Yi·Qian·Classical Chinese】Don't use Qianlong, Yang Qi is hidden.　Restore it again. [Yi·Ci] A gentleman hides his implements in his body and moves when he waits for time.　I'm going to cut again, Yin Zang. Cursive name. 【Sima Xiangru·Zixu Fu】If the pike is wet, it will give birth to hidden cymbals and cymbals. [Note] Tibetan Crowfoot, cattle and horses in the grass.　Come on again, sound. 【Ritual·Monthly Order】I would like to cover up. [Jin Chinese] Wengong is also out of the country, but the beard is erected, and the Tibetan guards are not obeyed.　It is connected with Zeng again. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Illness Doctor】Refer to the movement of Jiuzang. 【Note】Zhengzang five, there are stomach, bladder, large intestine, small intestine. [Shu] The five elements of the right storage are the heart, liver, spleen, lung, and kidney, which are the storage of qi. [Baihutong] People have five Tibetans and six prefectures.　【Said Wen】"Han Shu" is general Zang. Textual research: [[Jin Chinese] Wen Gong is also the one who is born in Wen Gong, and Zhu Dou must be kept in Tibet. 〕 　 I would like to change my head according to the original text. 〔【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Physician】Participate in the movement of Jiuzang. 〔〕 　 I would like to change the doctor according to the original book.

тибетский
cáng / zàng
концентрированный
тибетский
Тибетский.
Ли i; ti имеет ii
cáng, zàng
I cáng гл.
1) прятаться
他藏在树后头 он прячется за деревом
教我们往哪儿藏 где бы нам спрятаться?
2) прятать; хранить, сберегать; запасать, копить
我有斗酒藏之久矣 у меня есть один доу вина, которое давно хранится
把这些东西藏起来 сохранить (спрятать) эти вещи
3) иметь, таить (в себе); скрывать; накоплять, совершенствовать
不藏怒 не таить в себе гнева
君子藏器于身, 待时而动 благородный муж держит под спудом свои таланты, чтобы пустить их в дело, когда наступает время для этого
II zàng сущ.
1) склад; кладовая; хранилище; амбар; сокровищница; залежь
俄而范氏之藏大火 вскоре в сокровищнице Фаня вспыхнул сильный пожар
2) питака (санскр. Pitaka), буддийский канон
佛教三藏 трипитака, тройственный буддийский канон (经, 律, 论)
III собств.
1) zàng геогр. (сокр. вм. 西藏) Тибет; тибетский
驻藏大臣 наместник в Тибете
前藏 передний Тибет
后藏 дальний (глубокий) Тибет
2) cáng Цан (фамилия)
